HAPPYBRAIN \u00A9 is our way of sharing psychological research so that we can better manage life’s stresses. We often can’t change our experience, but we can change our response to it. When we are able to choose, we are generally happier with the decision. In our research, we found that autonomy – the desire to be self-directed - was an important factor in determining how optimistic we felt. You can develop your sense of Autonomy by thinking about why you make the choices you do so that you can stay connected with the reason behind your choices.
